item.description: Hello,my name is Val Kaplun and welcome to my blog

Resume Valeriy Kaplun kaplun.valeriy@gmail.com 856-278-4414 West Chester, PA Technologies Languages DevOps Tools OS Database Machine Learning Data Engineering Software Management Cloud Python Docker Ubuntu Oracle Tensorflow SSIS Rally AWS Go Kubernetes Windows Server SQL Server Xgboost Airflow Jira Private Cloud Bash Terraform CentOS Postgres Sklearn Pandas SQL Concourse Jupyter Notebooks Rust Github Skills API development Data wrangling Statistical analysis SQL query tunning Agile software development ML modeling Data mining ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Data architecture Created automation script Description Devops Engineer within a business intelligence team working on improving the teams data infrastructure, creating or improving data pipelines, and automation.
